title: Getting started with JSF 4.0 on WildFly 27
content: This article contains a preview of Jakarta Faces 4.0 which is an MVC framework for building user interface with Jakarta EE 10. To get started with Jakarta EE 10, you need to download the latest release of WildFly 27 which you can use to preview Jakarta EE 10 features. At the time of writing, the ...  The post appeared first on .
